message.content:
cs.DC, cs.GT, cs.CC, cs.NI, cs.SY. 

This paper deals with on-demand resource provisioning in cloud computing, which is a topic related to distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper proposes an auction mechanism for dynamic VM provisioning and pricing, which involves game theory (cs.GT) and optimization (cs.CC). The mechanism also considers geo-distributed cloud data centers, which falls under the category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) and systems and control (cs.SY).
